title: Centre proposes labelling AI content amid growing concerns over deepfakes and misinformation

title: DWP 'flagging' state pensioners as investigations launched

content:

title: Ukraine unveils upgraded sea drone it says can strike anywhere in Black Sea
description: KYIV, Oct 22:  Ukraine’s state security service has unveiled an upgraded sea drone it says can now operate anywhere in the Black Sea, carry heavier weapons and use artificial intelligence for targeting.   Ukraine has used the unmanned naval drones to target Russian shipping and infrastructure in the Black Sea. The Security Service of Ukraine, known by its Ukrainian acronym SBU, has credited strikes by the unmanned vessel known as the ” Sea Baby” with forcing a strategic shift in […]

title: Why OpenAI Co-Founder Believes AGI Won’t Arrive in the Next Decade
description: Even as OpenAI invests billions in compute to accelerate the path to AGI, former co-founder Andrej Karpathy believes true AGI remains a decade away. In a recent podcast with Dwarkesh Patel, he opined that while AI agents like Claude and Codex are impressive, achieving artificial general intelligence (AGI) still feels distant.
content:

title: How AI apps are reshaping retail ahead of holiday shopping season
description: Increasingly, when consumers ask ChatGPT, Claude, and other artificial intelligence apps for advice on gift ideas, the responses come back with “buy” buttons.
